about_the_game:
This demo is identical to Hell Survivors: Prologue, featuring:

- Runs of 10 minutes
- 3 playable heroes
- 3 weapons
- 10 upgrade trees, featuring 4 upgrades each (total of 40 different upgrades)
- 5 enemies, including 1 elite and 1 boss

name: Hell Survivors Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
